notice.sql: select (case when cast (extract(MINUTE from (tel.created_at-bse.eventdate)) as integer) > 10 then 'TRUE' else 'FALSE' end) as result from batch_schedule_event bse, trainer_event_log tel where bse.id = tel.event_id and tel.event_status='TEACHING' and cast (bse.id as varchar) like ':event_id' order by tel.created_at limit 1
